title: Pulisic's Problem with Tuchel
description:
The FC crew discuss Christian Pulisic's new book, where he admits being "dumbfounded" by Thomas Tuchel's decision to bench him in the 2021 Champions League semifinals. Gemma Soler provides an update on Atletico Madrid and Spain's response to the racial abuse fans gave Vinicius Junior during the Madrid derby. Plus, Steve Nicol and Dan Thomas continue to debate Arsenal's performances this season.
